G

Generation - Class in <Unnamed>
Generation defines a Generation with the given states (1, 0) at a fixed time Each Generation encapsulates a boolean array that represents the cell states The cells are indexed from left to right starting at zero Maria Doan helped me fix getStates (String, char)
Generation(boolean...) - Constructor for class Generation
A Generation is a row in the ECA with a collection of "cells", each a unique value of true or false.
Generation(String, char) - Constructor for class Generation
Create a Generation with one cell for each character in the given String ('1','0', etc).
getGeneration(int) - Method in class Automaton
Returns the Generation produced during the given time step; if the generation has not evolved that far, find the difference between the desired number of steps and the current number of steps it has evolved, then call the evolve method to complete the rest of the evolutions
getNeighborhood(int, Generation) - Static method in class Rule
Using circular boundary conditions, this method receives the values of the state of the current index, the cell to its left, and the cell to its right; int index in the loop is the basis code that receives the state of the left and right neighbor, along with the current state if the current state is at the end of the array, it will access the conditional regarding this situation and "wrap around" to the beginning of the Generation array to retrieve the value of the index to its right Likewise, if the current state is at the beginning of the array, its left neighbor will wrap around to the end of the array
getRuleNum() - Method in class Automaton
Return the Wolfram code for the rule that governs the ECA
getRuleNum() - Method in class Rule
This returns the rule's Wolfram code
getState(int) - Method in class Generation
Return the state of the cell with the given index.
getStates() - Method in class Generation
Return an array with all of the cell states and ensures its immutable so that its values remain unique for the generation This is essential when defining a Generation and evolving, so that the previous Generation (row) does not change as well.
getStates(char, char) - Method in class Generation
this returns the String format of a true or false value of each state.
getTotalSteps() - Method in class Automaton
Return the total number of steps that the ECA has evolved
